pages.text: These are verses of the clear (and clarifying) book
You may kill yourself with grief because they do not become believers
If We want, We send down a sign to them from the sky so their necks bend in humility for it
No new reminder comes to them from the beneficent, unless they turn away from it
They have denied, so the news of what they used to ridicule it is going to come to them
Or did they not look at the earth, that how many of all kind of splendid plants did We grow in it
Indeed there is a sign in that, and most of them are not believers
And indeed your Master, He is the powerful and the merciful
And (remember) when your Master called Moses: go to the wrongdoing people
people of Pharaoh, (and ask) would they not be cautious (of God)
He said: my Master, I am afraid that they deny me
and my chest becomes tight and my tongue stutters, so send (the message) to Aaron
And they have a charge against me, so I am afraid that they kill me
He (God) said: no way, you two go with Our signs, We are with you, listening
So you two go to Pharaoh and say: indeed we are messengers of the Master of Human kind
send the children of Israel with us
He (Pharaoh) said: did we not bring you up among us as a child, and you stayed among us for years of your life
And you did your work that you did (and committed murder), and you are of the ungrateful ones
